TopicTitle: Cannot define variable with another variable. Help!

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to do this: 

@volume = #$../RESOURCE[Kerbolene]/maxAmount$

And it says this in the log: 

[LOG 19:34:41.286] [ModuleManager] Error - Cannot parse variable search when editing key volume = #$../RESOURCE[Kerbolene]/maxAmount$

I don't understand, any help?

Edit: Mods, can you move this to the Help and Support subforum please?
